sentences.en: A helicopter landed in a clearing in the dense jungle.
sentences.cn: 一架直升机在茂密丛林中的一片空地着陆了。

sentences.en: After supper Mary set about clearing the table.
sentences.cn: 晚饭后,玛丽动手收拾餐桌.

sentences.en: Clearing one's conscience is medicinal for the soul.
Emergency teams are still clearing the debris from the plane crash.
sentences.cn: 各抢救小组仍在清理失事飞机的残骸。

sentences.en: Fire-men were still clearing rubble from apartments damaged at the scene of the attack.
sentences.cn: 消防队员仍在从袭击现场遭到毁坏的公寓里往外清理瓦砾。

sentences.en: I have had antibiotics for my sinusitis but it doesn't seem to be clearing up.
sentences.cn: 我服用了抗生素来治疗鼻窦炎，但似乎未能根治。

sentences.en: I took the precaution of clearing out my desk before I left.
sentences.cn: 我临走时特地事先把办公桌清理了一下。

sentences.en: It all depends on the weather clearing up.
sentences.cn: 这完全取决于天气是否会放晴。

sentences.en: It was a clearing just downhill from a peak of eight thousand feet.
sentences.cn: 那片空地就在8,000英尺高的山峰下。

sentences.en: It's stopped snowing and is clearing up.
She was in the middle of clearing the breakfast things.
sentences.cn: 她正在忙着收拾早饭后的那一摊子。

sentences.en: Ships entering and clearing must be inspected.
sentences.cn: 船只进出港口必须经过检查.

sentences.en: The men were clearing all the pollution off the shore.
sentences.cn: 人们在清除海滩上的污染物.

sentences.en: They are clearing out the tank.
They pitched their tent in a little clearing in the wood.
sentences.cn: 他们在树林里的一块小空地上支起了帐篷.

sentences.en: We gave him covering fire as he dashed across the clearing.
sentences.cn: 我们用火掩护他冲过空地.

words.tran_cn: 清楚的；清澈的；晴朗的；无罪的
清晰地；明显地；无疑地；明净地

phrases.tran_cn: [医]清净剂；清算代理；交换代理人
票据交换银行，清算银行
清算中心；票据交换中心
通信连络断开时间；电话的话终时间；透明时间，定透时间
清除地物；开荒；清理土地；场地清理

trans.tran_en: a small area in a forest where there are no trees

trans.tran_cn: 理清， 清除（ clear的现在分词）
